title: Game Changer Box Office Collections: Ram Charan and Shankar film scores a mere 125cr weekend worldwide - PINKVILLA
summary:
Game Changer Box Office Collections: Ram Charan and Shankar film scores a mere 125cr weekend worldwide

Publication Date: January 13, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

The film Game Changer has witnessed a dramatic decline in box office collections, grossing a total of Rs. 125 crore during its opening weekend worldwide.

  • The film's collections dropped significantly, adding only Rs. 17.50 crore on Sunday.
  • In India, the total collection stands at Rs. 99.75 crore.
  • Overseas, it grossed approximately USD 2.90 million.
  • In Telugu states, it earned only Rs. 6.50 crore on its worst Sunday in recent years.
  • The expected closing collection is between Rs. 75-80 crore in Telugu states.

The Box Office Collections of Game Changer:

Area Gross
AP/TS Rs. 60.50 cr.
Nizam Rs. 20.50 cr.
Ceded Rs. 11.25 cr.
Andhra Rs. 28.75 cr.
Karnataka Rs. 7.25 cr.
Tamil Nadu Rs. 5.50 cr.
Kerala Rs. 0.50 cr.
Rest of India Rs. 26.00 cr.
OVERSEAS USD 2,930,000 (Rs. 25.00 cr.)
WORLDWIDE Rs. 124.75 cr.
It is essentially “game over” for Game Changer as collections have plummeted to alarmingly low levels.

In conclusion, despite expectations during the Sankranti holidays, the film is unlikely to recover and face significant financial losses.
newTitle: Game Changer Box Office Collections: Ram Charan and Shankar film scores a mere 125cr weekend worldwide

Inventing Anna actor Julia Garner interview: ‘Nothing’s ever really easy if you want it to be good' - Hindustan Times
summary:
Julia Garner Discusses Her Role in Wolf Man and the Challenges of Horror Films

Publication Date: N/A Source: Hindustan Times

In an interview with Hindustan Times, Julia Garner opens up about her transition from the hit Netflix series Inventing Anna to starring in the upcoming film Wolf Man, highlighting the unique experiences and challenges of horror filmmaking.

  • Garner reflects on her journey from playing a scam artist to starring in a traditional monster movie.
  • She describes Wolf Man as a film meant for the big screen, emphasizing the cinematic experience.
  • Garner's character, Charlotte, experiences emotional complexity as her husband transforms into a werewolf.
  • The preparation involved interviewing working mothers to portray Charlotte's struggles authentically.
  • Garner mentions the physical demands of the role, stating that it involved significantly more running than any previous projects.
“Nothing's ever really easy if you want it to be good. Usually, the simplest things are the hardest.” – Julia Garner

The film Wolf Man is not just a horror movie; it serves as a narrative about relationships, loss, and the fight for survival against overwhelming odds.
newTitle: Julia Garner Discusses Her Role in Wolf Man and the Challenges of Horror Films

title: Triptii Dimri Dropped From Kartik Aaryan’s Aashiqui 3 As She Lacked 'Purity In Demeanour'? Anurag Basu REAC - News18
summary:
Triptii Dimri Dropped From Aashiqui 3: Anurag Basu Clarifies Rumors

Publication Date: January 12, 2025

Source: News18

The news that Triptii Dimri was dropped from the upcoming film Aashiqui 3 has sparked rumors about the reasons behind her exit. Filmmaker Anurag Basu has clarified that the rumor she lacked ‘purity in demeanour’ is not true.

  • Triptii Dimri was reported to be removed from Aashiqui 3 due to her bold image in previous films.
  • Anurag Basu stated, “That’s not true. Triptii knows it too.”
  • Aashiqui 3 is now indefinitely postponed, and a new lead actress is yet to be cast.
  • Triptii Dimri will be next seen in Vishal Bhardwaj’s film ‘Arjun Ustara’.
“Triptii knows it too.” - Anurag Basu

This incident highlights ongoing discussions about image and casting in the film industry, especially regarding the perceived suitability of actors for certain roles.

title: Daaku Maharaaj Box Office Collection Day 1 (Early Trends): NBK Earns 35% More Than The Entire Lifetime Collection Of His Last Theatrical Release! - Koimoi
summary:
Daaku Maharaaj Box Office Collection Day 1 (Early Trends)

Publication Date: January 12, 2025

Source: Koimoi

Nandamuri Balakrishna’s new film, Daaku Maharaaj, is off to a strong start at the box office, surpassing the opening day earnings of his previous release, Bhagavanth Kesari.

  • The film earned between 22 to 24 crore on its opening day.
  • This is approximately 35% higher than Bhagavanth Kesari, which earned 16.6 crore.
  • Daaku Maharaaj opened 80% higher than Tollywood’s last Sankranti hit, HanuMan.
  • While it performed better than some releases, it fell short of rival Guntur Kaaram’s opening day total of 42 crore.
“Box office numbers are based on estimates and various sources. Numbers have not been independently verified by Koimoi.”
